CustomField.description: How many of the particular Role do you need to compare? (If Comparison is "less than" then this would be if the Number of Roles is < Count then thrown an error)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How many of the particular Role do you need to compare? (If Comparison is "less than" then this would be if the Number of Roles is < Count then thrown an error)
CustomField.label: to this Count
